title: Flexible fish stew
description: A deliciously simple fish stew - I call it my flexible fish stew because you can use whatever white fish you have to hand. The secret is building a great tasting base.
ingredients: 1 bulb fennel, finely chopped, fronds reserved for garnish
6-8 baby new potatoes (preferably Jersey Royals), washed and halved
small fillet haddock (about 150-170g), skinned, pin boned and cut into chunks
small fillet monkfish (about 150-170g), skinned, pin boned and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
